sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"改进，改善"之意。
means: improve ： 最常用词，多指状态或性质上的深刻或重要改进，也可指自身能力的提高。
better ： 多用于口语，指适当地改善原来并非很差的状态或性质，也指社会地位、经济状况的改善。
perfect ： 语义强，通常指使方法、技术等达到完善美好的境地。
refine ： 侧重指使语言、仪态等变得文雅、优美，也可指技艺等的提高。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均含"完美的，极好的"之意。
means: perfect ： 用于褒义指某人或某物等达到理想中的完美无缺；用于贬义，则相反，指十足的坏。
ideal ： 语气较强，指完美到使人称心如意的地步。

sentence.Network_en: He mixed business and pleasure in a perfect and dynamic way.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以互动的方式将工作和娱乐完美地结合起来。

sentence.Network_en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

sentence.Network_en: He was not a paragon. He would never be perfect.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不是完人，永远不可能十全十美。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...肥健身视频完美减肥产品瘦出完美身形美丽无法阻挡完美(PERFECT)的产品可以减肥吗? 高纤餐和。

list.abs: 21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(一) - 豆丁网 ... dissatisfaction n. 不满 perfection n. 完美；完善 disappoint vt. 使失望.
《Friends》词汇表A ... letting n. 出租 perfection n. 尽善尽美, 完美, 完成 loathe vt. 厌恶, 憎恶.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French perfet, from Latin perfectus 'completed', from the verb perficere, from per- 'through, completely' + facere 'do'

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 perfect n. 完成式 adj. 完美的， 全然的， 理想的， 正确的， 熟练的， 精通的完成式的 vt. 使完美， 修改， 使熟练 最近的网络游戏中常常会出现perfect这个词，这个单词的意思是指 ：完美的；理想的 ,也有完胜的意思 做理论物理的我们可以聊聊这个问题： 做形式理论的，如果某个实验能被perfect解释，往往大家欢欣鼓舞。一般情况下也不会太在意有多么perfect，因为即便不那么perfect，也已经基本解决物理问题了。 而作

entry.def: Something that is perfect is as good as it could possibly be.

example.ex: Hiring a nanny has turned out to be the perfect solution...
example.tran: 雇用保姆结果成了解决问题的最佳方法。

entry.def: If you say that something is perfect for a particular person, thing, or activity, you are emphasizing that it is very suitable for them or for that activity.

example.ex: Carpet tiles are perfect for kitchens because they're easy to take up and wash...
example.tran: 方块地毯非常适用于厨房，因为其便于揭起来清洗。

example.ex: So this could be the perfect time to buy a home.
example.tran: 所以这可能是买房子的绝佳时机。

entry.tran: 无瑕的；完好的；完美无缺的
entry.def: If an object or surface is perfect, it does not have any marks on it, or does not have any lumps, hollows, or cracks in it.

example.ex: Use only clean, Grade A, perfect eggs.
example.tran: 只用表面干净、无磕碰的A级鸡蛋。

entry.def: You can use perfect to give emphasis to the noun following it.

example.ex: Some people are always coming up to perfect strangers and asking them what they do...
example.tran: 有些人总爱和完全不认识的人搭讪，询问人家的职业。

entry.def: If you perfect something, you improve it so that it becomes as good as it can possibly be.

example.ex: We perfected a hand-signal system so that he could keep me informed of hazards...
example.tran: 我们完善了一套手势信号，这样他就能随时告知我什么时候有危险了。

example.ex: I removed the fibroid tumours, using the techniques that I have perfected.
example.tran: 我用完善后的技术摘掉了纤维瘤。

entry.def: The perfect tenses of a verb are the ones used to talk about things that happened or began before a particular time, as in 'He's already left' and 'They had always liked her'. The present perfect tense is sometimes called the perfect tense.

means.word_mean: 1. a tense of verbs used in describing action that has been completed (sometimes regarded as perfective aspect)
1. being complete of its kind and without defect or blemish;
2. without qualification; used informally as (often pejorative) intensifiers;

auth_sentence.content: We shouldn't be surprised that no-one is perfect.
auth_sentence.res_content: We shouldn't be surprised that no-one is perfect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We shouldn't be surprised that no-one is perfect.

auth_sentence.content: The marathon was the perfect finale to it all.
auth_sentence.res_content: The marathon was the perfect finale to it all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The marathon was the perfect finale to it all.

auth_sentence.content: It is not perfect, from the press perspective.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is not perfect, from the press perspective.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is not perfect, from the press perspective.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受到影响的,不自然的,假装的
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ed……的→被影响的
affection[n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适]+ate……的→adj.挚爱的,充满感情的
affect情感+ive……的→adj.情感的,表达感情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象
stems_affixes.word_buile: effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+ive……的→adj.有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象

stems_affixes.value_cn: 传染的,传染性的,有感染力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infect传染+ious……的→adj.传染的,传染性的,有感染力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的
disaffect[v.使不满意,使疏远]+ed……的→adj.[政治上]不满的,叛离的
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ion表名词→n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
confect[v.调制,n.西点,糖果]+ion某种物→n.甜食,糖果

stems_affixes.value_cn: 糖果制造人, 糖果店
stems_affixes.word_buile: confection[n.甜食,糖果]+ery场所→n.糖果制造人, 糖果店
de坏+fect做,制作→做坏了→缺陷
de坏+fect做+ion表名词→做坏事
affect感动+ation表名词→做出的感动→做作
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
infect[v.传染,感染;影响[思想等]]+ion状态→n.感染,传染;传染病
perfect[adj.完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的 v.使完美]+ion表名词→n.尽善尽美,完美
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
dis分开+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+u+ate表动词→v.实行,完成
in进入+fect做,制作→做进去→传染进去
per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的

Sentence.sentence: And now, most of the British public is familiar even with the extremes of Heston BlumenthaPs molecular gastronomy, a form of cooking that employs scientific methods to create the perfect dish.
Boys'chools are the perfect place to teach young men to express their emotions and involve them in activities such as art, dance and music

Smith has written a breezy guidebook, with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity - parks, say, or the various schemes that have been put forward over the years for building the perfect city.
On the face of it, it seems the perfect solution.

means.word_mean: 完美的, 完善的, 理想的

sentences.en: The shoes are a perfect fit.
She is a perfect wife and mother.
The weather is perfect for a picnic.
sentences.cn: 这种天气举行野餐好极了。

means.word_mean: 完整的; 完好无损的; 无缺陷的

sentences.en: The work is perfect in craftsmanship.
Her husband is a perfect jellyfish.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫是个典型的优柔寡断的人。

sentences.en: He went to Italy to perfect his singing voice.
sentences.cn: 他去意大利提高自己的歌唱技艺。

sentences.en: They tried to perfect the working conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们努力完善工作条件。

sentences.en: The youthful learners who desired to perfect their education studied hard.
sentences.cn: 希望完成学业的年轻学者们努力学习。

sentences.en: The object of this society is to perfect its members practically and scientifically.
sentences.cn: 这个社团的目的是实际地、科学地及充分地指导其成员。

jushi.english: Though he felt his anger mounting, he kept perfect control of himself.
jushi.chinese: 他虽然觉得越来越生气,但还是很好地控制住自己。

jushi.english: He is a perfect stranger to me.
